ZoomSettings.q1: Place these carcases in order from 1st to 4th
ZoomSettings.q2: 1. Which is the highest yielding carcase?
ZoomSettings.q3: 2. Which carcase has the lightest muscled hind quarter?
ZoomSettings.q4: 3. Which carcase has the largest rib eye?
ZoomSettings.q5: 4. Which carcase is the fattest over the rib eye?
ZoomSettings.q6: 5. Which carcase has the most acceptable meat colour in the rib eye?
ZoomSettings.q7: 6. Between 1 and 2 which carcase has the largest rib eye?
ZoomSettings.q8: 7. Which carcase is the trimmest over the rump and loin?
ZoomSettings.q9: 8. Which carcase is the fattest over the rump and loin?
ZoomSettings.q11: 10. Which carcase would have the lowest muscle score?
